name: Tequila Shots With Sangrita Chasers
description: There’s only one way to improve on tequila shots: chase them with a short glass of spicy, citrusy sangrita. This recipe makes an entire pitcher of sangrita, enough for several shots, though you could also pair it with very cold Mexican beer.
recipeYield: About 3 cups sangrita (enough to accompany many shots)
keywords: grenadine syrup, tabasco sauce, tequila, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup grenadine syrup (use one with real pomegranate, like Employees Only or Fee Brothers)
Reposado tequila (use about 1 1/2 ounces per shot)

recipeInstructions.text: To make sangrita, mix all ingredients except tequila in a pitcher and chill well.
Shake tequila with ice; strain into shot glasses. Serve sangrita in small glasses to chase tequila shots.
